    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.controller that throw SantoriniException 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Turn.build​(Component component, Cell cell)
    This method call the build of the strategyBuild
    void TurnManager.build​(Component component, Cell cell)
    This method call the build method of the strategyBuild of the current turn and and call the updateCurrentPhase method to update the current phase
    void Turn.move​(Cell cell)
    This method call the move of the strategyMove for move the selected Worker
    void TurnManager.move​(Cell cell)
    This method call the move method of the strategyMove of the current turn and and call the updateCurrentPhase method to update the current phase

  • Uses of SantoriniException in it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.exceptions

    Subclasses of SantoriniException in it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.exceptions 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BuildLowerComponentException
    This Exception is thrown if you try to build a component on an upper component (ex: LEVEL1 on LEVEL2)
    class  CellOutOfBoundsException
    This Exception is thrown if you try to get a cell with a coordinate out of island's bounds
    class  ComponentNotAllowed
    This Exception is thrown if the player selected the wrong type of component to build
    class  OldUserException  
    class  RemoveGroundLevelException
    This Exception is thrown if you try to remove the ground level of a tower
    class  WorkerAlreadyPresentException
    This Exception is thrown if you try to put two workers on a single cell
    class  WrongCellSelectedBuildException
    This Exception is thrown if the player selected a wrong cell where make the worker build
    class  WrongCellSelectedMoveException
    This Exception is thrown if the player selected a wrong cell where move the worker
    class  YoungUserException  
    class  ZeroCellsAvailableBuildException
    This Exception is thrown if there aren't available cells where the worker can build
    class  ZeroCellsAvailableMoveException
    This Exception is thrown if there aren't available cells where move the worker
